doc:
Tod Slaughter https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tod_Slaughter 0 Tod Slaughter (born Norman Carter Slaughter, 19 March 1885 – 19 February 1956) was an English actor, best known for playing over-the-top maniacs in macabre film adaptations of Victorian melodramas. Tod_Slaughter ( born Norman_Carter_Slaughter , 19_March_1885 – 19_February_1956 ) was an_English_actor , best_known for playing over-the-top_maniacs in macabre_film_adaptations of Victorian_melodramas .
